name: Fade
author: Alobaidi

sections.description:
Fade

Add fade effect to wordpress easily, CSS3 only, without JavaScript! custom fade color and time, easy to use, compatible with all major browsers.

The Features

  1. Fade effect using CSS3.
  2. Without JavaScript.
  3. Custom fade color and time.
  4. Compatible with all major browsers.
  5. Easy to use.

Live Demo

  • http://wp-plugins.in/fade-plugin

Rate The Plugin

  • Please rate Fade plugin

More Plugins

  • My Plugins
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘fade’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Now read explanation of use.
sections.faq:
FAQ

  • Read explanation of use
  • For more questions or help, contact me.
  • Or on twitter.
